identity.name: VetFlow
identity.description: A veterinary practice management system that blends clinical precision with human warmth. It reduces cognitive load for busy vets while providing a comforting, trustworthy interface for pet owners.

typography.instructions: Use Manrope for all headings to establish a modern, friendly but technical feel. Use Public Sans for dense data tables and records for maximum legibility. Avoid generic Inter for headings.

colors.theme_strategy: Organic & Earthy (Archetype 1). The primary Deep Jungle Green (#0F4C5C) conveys medical authority without the coldness of standard blue. The Sage Mist (#E0ECE4) provides a calming secondary layer. Living Coral (#FF6B6B) is used sparingly for alerts and high-priority actions (like 'Emergency' or 'Overdue').

grid_system.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6 p-6 md:p-8

strategies: Use the 'Control Room' grid for the main dashboard: High density, data correlation.
Use 'Bento' style layouts for patient summaries (mixing photos, stats, and quick actions).
Always use generous padding inside cards (p-6) to prevent the 'cramped data' look common in medical apps.

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-lg border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200
cards.glass: bg-white/80 dark:bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 shadow-lg

inputs.style: rounded-md border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

navigation.sidebar: bg-card border-r border-border h-screen sticky top-0

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for hover states, shadow-xl for modals.
visual_enhancers.borders: Subtle 1px borders (border-border/60) to define structure without harsh lines.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly on sticky headers and modal overlays for a modern touch.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px for a refined, clinical look.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-lg (0.5rem) for cards, rounded-md for buttons/inputs.

motion.page_load: Fade in with slight upward slide (opacity-0 translate-y-4 -> opacity-100 translate-y-0).
motion.micro_interactions: Button press scale (0.98), input focus ring expansion.

hero_vet.usage: Landing page hero, Login screen side image

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards. Use dark text on light backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.
accessibility.semantic_html: Use proper heading hierarchy (h1-h6), buttons for actions, links for navigation.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text or backgrounds unless specifically for a 'glass' effect.
Avoid 'medical blue' (#007bff). Use the custom Deep Jungle Green for a unique brand identity.
All interactive elements must have a data-testid attribute.
Prioritize 'Shadcn' components but customize the radius and shadows to match the 'Soft Utility' theme.
Ensure mobile responsiveness for all dashboard views (stack columns on mobile).
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-fidelity SaaS. Follow these guidelines strictly. Start by setting up the global CSS variables in index.css to match the 'Organic & Earthy' theme. Then, configure tailwind.config.js to use these variables. When building pages, use the 'Control Room' grid strategy for the dashboard and 'Bento' grids for summaries. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Ensure all components are accessible and responsive.
